titlealts.searchtitle: Data Element: TUMOUR HEIGHT ABOVE ANAL VERGE - Description

div.p: TUMOUR HEIGHT ABOVE ANAL VERGE is the approximate height of the lower limit of the Tumour above the anal verge (as measured by a rigid sigmoidoscopy), where the UCUM UNIT OF MEASUREMENT is 'Centimetres (cm)' during a Colorectal Cancer Care Spell.
